title: Business Practical Competency Enhancement: Blended Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Design for Social Sector

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners enhance the ability to apply sociological theories to real-world cases through the integration of mobile platforms and in-person classes.

Learners establish self-directed learning strategies—including personal learning goals, weekly plans, and progress tracking methods—using three digital tools (Notion, Trello, Google Workspace, etc.) in blended learning environments (online platforms + offline workshops) within three weeks, and submit two weeks of execution records following a learning journal template
Learners cultivate the capacity to systematically analyze learning outcomes by linking formative and summative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
